About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

I am a computer engineer with +5 experince in computer development. My aim is to work in ambigus companies to hance more skills and to continue contribute to build better community with software solutions.

King Salman hospital

Full Stack Developer

I worked for more than 5 years in KSAFH as programmer and I have built many software solution for the orgnization in medical sector. I contribute to develop HIS for the hospital using C# forms, and SQL database as well as crystal report to generate reports.

Free lancing

Front & Back End Developer

In my free time I work on client project to build rich and valuble websites. Also I used my skills in C# and SQL to develop project for the client.

Desiner
